revised_title: Investigation of Selenic Acid and Selenium Compounds
tldr: The authors conducted research on selenic acid and other selenium compounds, exploring their properties and concentrating the acid to study its chemistry more closely. They found that selenic acid has a close relationship to sulfuric acid and that concentrated selenic acid can be crystallized and separated from its liquid state. The authors also investigated the conditions for concentrating selenic acid in a vacuum and compared it to the concentration of sulfuric acid.
